title: How to write my own sentence in English - Quora

response.answer_text: You need a subject and a verb for an English sentence. You can also have an object. ‘Jill walked.’ In this sentence, ‘Jill’ is the subject and ‘walked’ is the verb. ‘Alex cooked dinner.’ In this sentence, ‘Alex’ is the subject, ‘cooked’ is the verb, and ‘dinner’ is the object. There are much more complicated things you can do with sentences, but these are the basics.
